languages.text: {n}Но так ли он искренен, каким хочет казаться? В изгибе его губ, в нервной полуулыбке вам чудится нечто... осуждающее? Насмешливое? Порицающее? А может, это {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}неспокойная совесть{/d}, взбудораженная цепким взглядом, играет с вами шутки, припоминая давнишний {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}проступок{/d}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Но так ли он искренен, каким хочет казаться? В изгибе его губ, в нервной полуулыбке вам чудится нечто... осуждающее? Насмешливое? Порицающее? А может, это {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}неспокойная совесть{/d}, взбудораженная цепким взглядом, играет с вами шутки, припоминая давнишний {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}проступок{/d}?{/n}

languages.text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Но так ли он искренен, каким хочет казаться? В изгибе его губ, в нервной полуулыбке вам чудится нечто... осуждающее? Насмешливое? Порицающее? А может, это {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}неспокойная совесть{/d}, взбудораженная цепким взглядом, играет с вами шутки, припоминая давнишний {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}проступок{/d}?{/n}

Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze?{/n}

{n}There is something in Drivestem's gaze that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? You are uncertain whether this is indeed true or merely your guilty conscience playing tricks on you, stirring up memories of your past under the governor's keen gaze.{/n}

Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管德莱夫斯塔总督努力做出一副真诚的表情，但他似笑非笑的紧张表情中，有某种东西让你感到局促不安。这是某种责备的暗示吗？还是嘲笑？抑或是某种谴责？或许，这一切仅仅是你自己的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}罪恶感{/d}在折磨你自己？在总督锐利的目光之下，你过去的回忆涌上了心头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管德莱夫斯塔总督努力做出一副真诚的表情，但他似笑非笑的紧张表情中，有某种东西让你感到局促不安。这是某种责备的暗示吗？还是嘲笑？抑或是某种谴责？或许，这一切仅仅是你自己的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}罪恶感{/d}在折磨你自己？在总督锐利的目光之下，你过去的回忆涌上了心头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}So sehr sich der Gouverneur auch bemüht, aufrichtig zu erscheinen, beunruhigt dich etwas an seinem nervösen Lächeln. Ist es ein Anflug von Tadel? Spott? Verurteilung? Oder spielt dir unter dem strengen Blick des Gouverneurs nur dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}schlechtes Gewissen{/d} einen Streich, indem es alte Erinnerungen weckt?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}So sehr sich der Gouverneur auch bemüht, aufrichtig zu erscheinen, beunruhigt dich etwas an seinem nervösen Lächeln. Ist es ein Anflug von Tadel? Spott? Verurteilung? Oder spielt dir unter dem strengen Blick des Gouverneurs nur dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}schlechtes Gewissen{/d} einen Streich, indem es alte Erinnerungen weckt?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aussi sincère que le gouverneur s'efforce de paraître, quelque chose vous interpelle dans la courbure tendue de son demi-sourire. Serait-ce un soupçon de reproche ? De moquerie ? De condamnation ? Ou est-ce plutôt votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}mauvaise conscience{/d} qui, sous le regard perçant de votre vis-à-vis, vous joue des tours en faisant ressurgir dans votre esprit des souvenirs de votre passé ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aussi sincère que le gouverneur s'efforce de paraître, quelque chose vous interpelle dans la courbure tendue de son demi-sourire. Serait-ce un soupçon de reproche ? De moquerie ? De condamnation ? Ou est-ce plutôt votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}mauvaise conscience{/d} qui, sous le regard perçant de votre vis-à-vis, vous joue des tours en faisant ressurgir dans votre esprit des souvenirs de votre passé ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por mucho que el gobernador intente parecer sincero, hay algo perturbador en la curva de su media sonrisa. ¿Es un toque de reproche? ¿De burla? ¿De condena? ¿O tal vez es solo tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}conciencia culpable{/d} jugándote una mala pasada y despertando recuerdos de tu pasado bajo la penetrante mirada del gobernador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por mucho que el gobernador intente parecer sincero, hay algo perturbador en la curva de su media sonrisa. ¿Es un toque de reproche? ¿De burla? ¿De condena? ¿O tal vez es solo tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}conciencia culpable{/d} jugándote una mala pasada y despertando recuerdos de tu pasado bajo la penetrante mirada del gobernador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督がいかに誠実さを装っていようとも、その神経質そうな微妙な半笑いが作り出す曲線がなぜか気にかかる。侮辱？嘲り？非難？それとも単に{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}良心の呵責{/d}に苛まれ、過去の記憶を掻き立てられているだけなのだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督がいかに誠実さを装っていようとも、その神経質そうな微妙な半笑いが作り出す曲線がなぜか気にかかる。侮辱？嘲り？非難？それとも単に{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}良心の呵責{/d}に苛まれ、過去の記憶を掻き立てられているだけなのだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vali samimi görünmeye çalışsa da yüzündeki hafif tebessümde canını sıkan bir şeyler var. Bir serzeniş kırıntısı mı? Alay mı? Kınama mı?.. Yoksa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}vicdanındaki suçluluk duygusu{/d} sana oyun oynayıp geçmişte yaşadıklarını valinin keskin bakışlarında karşına mı çıkarıyor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as the governor is trying to appear sincere, there is something in the curve of his nervous half-smile that you find troubling. Is it a hint of reproach? Mockery? Condemnation? Or is it merely your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}guilty conscience{/d} playing tricks on you under the governor's keen gaze, stirring up memories of your past?{/n}
